quotes.cn: 问渠那得清如许，为有源头活水来
quotes.en: Asked him that so clear, as there is water flowing

quotes.cn: 学而不思则罔，思而不学则殆
quotes.en: Learning without thought means labour lost; thought without learning is perilous

quotes.cn: 乞丐并不会妒忌百万富翁，但是他肯定会妒忌收入更高的乞丐
quotes.en: Beggars don't envy millionaires, but they certainly envy beggars with higher incomes

quotes.cn: 命里有时终须有，命里无时莫强求
quotes.en: Sometimes in life, there must be, but never in life
